original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.70. Saraṇaduka, Kusalattika🔽Araṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. original: Araṇo abyākato dhammo naaraṇassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Araṇo abyākato dhammo nasaraṇassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
